page.title: 12Sarn Inn
page.content: Sarn Inn is by our school.The landlord employs two people outside his family. The porch was built in 1884 and the {pub}was built soon after.They use about 14 barrels and each holds 11 gallons.On average they take about 1100 pounds a week.The{bar meals}they supply are (Fish) plaice,trout,scampi (Meat) sausage,pies,ham,turkey,gammon (Poultry)you can buy chicken and honey roasted duck.(pizza) cheese and tomato pizza (steaks) ploughmans,cheese,ham, turkey.There is also a variety of starters and desserts.At the moment four people live there and they are all adults.They have a one-arm bandit, a bar-billiards table and a dart board. They sell peanuts,sweets,crisps and bars of chocolate.They get their beer from Burtonwood brewery in Newtown.
